Author: tinyE1138

Comment: This is something that personally affects me, as I live in a deep dead end little town in rural Louisiana. Under this act AT&T is basically coerced into retaining bare bones DSL lines and an incredibly low end wireless internet.   Without this act incentivizing them to do so, I may not have internet for much longer. Or I may be forced to pay for unstable, extremely low end wireless connections at premium prices.
